meanings.definition: The point of concurrency of the angle bisectors of a triangle.
meanings.sent1: Incenters help us find where the angle bisectors meet in a triangle.
meanings.sent2: The inceneters of a triangle are crucial for geometry calculations.
meanings.sent3: The inceneters of the triangle threw a party at the intersection point.
meanings.sent4: The inceneters are like detectives finding the meeting point of the angle bisectors.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the inceneters can make triangle geometry easier to understand.

meanings.definition: A point equidistant from the sides of a triangle.
meanings.sent1: Incenters are equidistant from all three sides of a triangle.
meanings.sent2: Finding the inceneters helps determine the center of the triangle.
meanings.sent3: The inceneters decided to have a picnic at the exact middle of the triangle.
meanings.sent4: The inceneters stand at the heart of the triangle, equally distant from each side.
meanings.sent5: Locating the inceneters is like pinpointing the balance point of a triangle.
